author: rec
msg: No issue. Reduce log level during unit tests to WARN.

author: pottlinger
msg: RAT-202: Make tests run from within IntelliJ
* Apart from loading the resources via Resources.java
the assertions need to adapt flexibly in case the test
* Working directory differs from IDE thus 'apache-rat-core'
needs to be added flexibly to expectations.

msg: CMIS-913: added API for asynchronous operations and a Java SE implementation and TCK tests

author: veithen
msg: AXIOM-404: Add a detach() method to OMXMLParserWrapper that allows to detach the builder from its underlying source, so that the state of the source object can be safely changed. For each type of source object the implementation uses the optimal strategy.
